attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I really need to urge you to consider the effect of the abolision of the 10pence in the pound tax rate.

I had to take early retirement on a small private pension on which I pay tax. my wife has a small part time job.

We are going to be hit with this new tax situation very badly indeed.

We do not benefit from any of the measures you outlined nor do I believe will the huge number of people in the same boat and who are on a small income.

giving us a one off £50 next December on the heating allowance is frankly quite insulting to our intelligence.

I suggest that you listen to these people because the Labour party is hitting the working people that it has stood for for generations. Surely common sense must prevail if Labour is to remain in power.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
